description.fr: Recruter le Bwork adverse en l'achevant avec {Companion:852!}, et vaincre les Rats adverses.
description.en: Recruit the opposing Bwork by finishing them off with {Companion:852!}, and defeat the opposing Rats.
description.es: Reclutar al bwork enemigo acabando con él con {Companion:852!}, y vencer a las ratas enemigas.
description.de: Rekrutiere den gegnerischen Bwork, indem du ihn mit {Companion:852!} besiegst, und besiege die gegnerischen Ratten.
description.pt: Recrutar o Bwork adversário acabando com ele com {Companion:852!}, e derrotar os Ratos adversários.
